A Jeff Bezos-backed startup aims to appeal to American car buyers patriotism and pocketbooks.

articles.author: Sarina Trangle
articles.title: The US-China Trade War Could Mean 'Empty Shelves' Soon, Apollo Says - Investopedia
articles.description: American shop shelves, aisles and racks could be empty in a few weeks as imports slow, according to Apollo Global Management's analysis of shipping data.
articles.content:
• The number of ships carrying goods from China to the US has been "collapsing" in recent weeks, according to Apollo's chief economist, Torsten Sløk.
